description:
Struggling with breastfeeding your baby ?
Or anxious about whether you’ll be able to breastfeed when your baby is born?
Well you’re not alone, struggles with breastfeeding are more common than you think!

Although breastfeeding is natural it doesn’t come naturally to everyone and pregnant women don’t always get informed of how difficult it can actually be, they are thrown into motherhood and expected to be able to latch their baby to the breast with ease, but IT’S NOT EASY!

THIS IS WHERE WE CAN HELP YOU!!

The Happy Baby Club has created Breastfeeding Your Quest To Success an educational course containing helpful advice and tips from our breastfeeding mother Kimberley. Through 12 tutorial videos, Kimberley covers a range of breastfeeding topics. She demonstrates different feeding options with examples that will help guide new mothers to find the best way to breast feed their baby.

BREASTFEEDING Your Quest To Success is designed to help mothers feel confident and successful in their breastfeeding journey.
title: Breastfeeding: Your Quest for Success
